lexUnit.name: skirmish.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an episode of irrgular or unpremeditated fighting, especially between small or outlying parts of armies

sentence.text: She resigned finally from the co-operative over a minor political skirmish about which rooms in the shop would be open to men .
